vignette.Rmd

CorrGrapheR

This package aims to plot correlations between variables in form of a graph. Variables correlated with each other shall be close, and correlated negatively - far from each other.

Example 1 - Seatbelts

df <- as.data.frame(datasets::Seatbelts) %>%
  select(-law)
plot_corrgraph(df)
## Warning in plot_corrgraph(df): Package in experimental state. Use this function ONLY with dfs which ALL columns are numeric 
##           (i.e. calculating corelation with cor() makes sense).

Example 2 - FIFA
